About me

Hi, I'm Nikkel, currently studying towards my bachelor's degree in IT-Systems Engineering at the Hasso-Plattner-Institute in Potsdam. I'm always open to learn and try out new things, but am especially interested in machine learning, CI/CD and everything that makes workflows more efficient!
If you are interested in my experience and skills, feel free to take a look at my CV or GitHub!

Projects

Random YouTube Video

One of the projects I'm currently working on is the Random YouTube Video Chrome extension, which allows you to truly shuffle from all videos uploaded on a channel - without the need for playlists. The extension adds a 'Shuffle' button to channel and video pages, and allows for thorough customization through its popup. Go check it out on the Chrome Web Store and on GitHub!

Notion integrations

JSON to Notion

I've also created a number of Notion integrations you can try out for yourself! The one I find most useful is the 'JSON to Notion' integration, which allows you to import JSON files to your Notion database. Using a configuration file, you can specify which properties of your JSON file should be imported, and define other transformations as necessary. You can find the project on my GitHub.

Steam API integration

Another Notion integration connects your Notion database to the Steam API. All you need is to add a Steam app ID field to your database, define which app properties you would like to have fetched, and the integration will automatically update your database entries. As always, you can find the project on GitHub.

Three.js

Three.js is a JavaScript library that allows for the creation and display of 3D computer graphics in a web browser. In April 2022, I built a very small demo page using the library, which you can find linked in the menu or directly through this link.
